## Introduction

There are several tools which can be used to perform de novo transcriptome assembly, such as Trinity.

Here, we only document some useful wiki pages which describe the de novo transcriptome assembly from vairous aspects, such as how to perform de novo transcriptome assembly with/without guided genome, assembly quality assessment, downstream analyses, etc.:

1. [Trinity wiki page](https://github.com/trinityrnaseq/trinityrnaseq/wiki) and local [archive](./data/trinityrnaseq.wiki.tar.gz)

2. [Bandage wiki page](https://github.com/rrwick/Bandage/wiki) and local [archive](./data/Bandage.wiki.tar.gz)
